Reviews.Title: great laptop at a great price
Reviews.Author: wilson rodriguez
Reviews.Content: if you want a great starter laptop at a price you can afford, then this is the laptop for you. it has plenty of USB connections for accessories and high speed internet capability. has a good picture resolution, and is quite durable. this unit is built to last!

Reviews.Title: Pirated Software
Reviews.Author: Adam S.
Reviews.Content: This computer came with a pirated version of Windows 7 and a copy of Office 2003 that had a bogus keycode.  I had to get an A-Z  refund and buy all new operating and software for the computer.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: paul luetkemeyer
Reviews.Content: My teenage daughter needed a laptop for her virtual schooling.  This laptop had all the functionality she needed and the price was right!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: dan w
Reviews.Content: 2nd one I bought and they both were better than I expected. I will never buy a new computer again

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The computer looks like new and works very good. Could not be happier. Price was right too. And it also has windows 7.

Reviews.Title: a lot for the money
Reviews.Author: Bernard M. Sullivan "bernrds"
Reviews.Content: We have had this laptop for a few weeks now and have been very pleased with the features and quality of this computer. Don't know how you could do better for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop!!
Reviews.Author: Joe Karski
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for a great price.  It had been wiped clean and was ready to go out of the box.  i will definitely more laptops from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: My refurbished Dell computer
Reviews.Author: mistergmc
Reviews.Content: The computer, although refurbished, is in like new condition! It performs all of the functions that I need, the screen resolution is brilliant, large and the processor is FAST!!  I am very pleased with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Raymond Ricci
Reviews.Content: I wasn't looking for a power house of a laptop when I got this. I just wanted something inexpensive for my writing, some work, and basic web browsing. And it's perfect for that. I adore the keyboard on this thing. The keys are all easy to press, delightfully clunky, and unlike some other, larger laptops, you don't need to hit the keys right in the middle for them to register presses- so you're able to type much more quickly and without missing any letters.battery life isn't phenomenal, but it's not bad if you're just using a word processor and facebook, which is mostly what I use it for.love it, would buy again.

Reviews.Title: works perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Hadad
Reviews.Content: I went with Tampa because they provided me with good products in the past.  This laptop is a good product at half the price of the new models and meets all my needs anyway

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: B. Bivins "Pet Lover"
Reviews.Content: I've only had this computer for just a few weeks now, however, I am well pleased with it for what I need to do.It does get a little hot when used for a few hours.  But all in all I am satisfied so far.

Reviews.Title: buyers beware
Reviews.Author: Vamba W Freeman
Reviews.Content: Item delivered via mail is not what was presented on the website which is deceptive. I am highly dissatisfied with the product and service. Shortly after opening the box I began sneezing; my body  began to itch as if dust mites where coming from it. The laptop was filthy, scratched up, beat up, missing parts, no battery etc. The laptop would only come on and stay on when plugged into circuit. When unplugged, the laptop immediately shuts down.  Rating of  0% due to insultingly poor service. Service to others should always be done in a spirit of excellence.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: chefmike200
Reviews.Content: I purchased this computer refurbished because I did not want to spend a ton on a new machine.  The quality of dell is outstanding and for under 200 dollars, this is so worth it.  Nice, clean, works like a pro.  I purchased this from Link-tronics because they had excellent seller feedback and stand by their products.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: camille
Reviews.Content: I love it! And I was able to sell my old laptop to him, for a reasonable price! Thanks Stark Laptops!!

Reviews.Title: Working well
Reviews.Author: Gena
Reviews.Content: My dell is working well! Just wish it had a webcam. But as far a the rest, it's great! My boss was impressed by the industrialized l

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love
Reviews.Author: Sierra S.
Reviews.Content: This computer is amazing. I've been very pleased with it. It shipped very quickly, it holds charge for hours, and it's very simple to use. I use it for school and personal use. There's plenty of space to hold my music and documents. I really love this computer. It doesn't have a webcam though. However, I just plug one in that I bought at the store. Very simple.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Adrian Cantu
Reviews.Content: The value for the price is hard to beat! Cool running computer, hardly ever gets hot with dual core. Screen is a little small but I got used to it very quickly. i really like the backlit keypad when I start typing.  Very lightweight and easy to carry anywhere. I paid $168  total for this laptop, shipping incluede. It is the best laptop I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Update
Reviews.Author: Robert Fucile "amexapm"
Reviews.Content: contacted the seller about the potential problem in authenticating Microsoft Windows and seller immediately emailed back with the proper key to ensure there would be no problem. for a used laptop, I must say it was well worth the purchase cost considering this was given to my young 12 year old son as his 1st laptop...I will definitely purchase from this seller again in the future...

Reviews.Title: Dell Perfection !!
Reviews.Author: AgentChin
Reviews.Content: This Dell works perfectly!  I am really enjoying it.  Talk about fast??!!  It is used and was described as having a few scratches but it is in near perfect condition.  And the battery lasts even longer than it is rated for.  The shipping was done for next day which was very exciting.  I am really impressed with this Seller's product and service.  This screen is huge; makes it easy to view photos and videos and be creative.  The power cord came with the laptop.  Read the listings carefully because some laptops don't have their power cord and they can be expensive.  I would order again from this Seller.

Reviews.Title: scam scam scam
Reviews.Author: Marianne
Reviews.Content: i purchased a new computer as shown on my receipt.  i got a refurbished but hey the response I got was oops sorry mail it back and then I will refund it.
